pages.md:
# Taking Photographs (Mode P)

This section describes how to take pictures using program AE (mode P). See pages 76–85 for information on S, A, and M modes.

1. Slide the **STILL/MOVIE** mode switch to **STILL**.

   !STILL/MOVIE Mode Switch

2. Rotate the focus mode selector to **S**.

   !Focus Mode Selector

3. Rotate the mode dial to **P**.

   !Mode Dial

   > ⚠️ Rotate the mode dial only after pressing the dial lock release to release the dial.

4. Confirm that **P** appears in the display.

   !Display Confirmation
